---
title: "Meeting 2"
---

The second meeting will take place 16–17 May at Chalmers, Gothenburg.

## Schedule

The meeting will start with lunch at 12:00 on Thursday, 16 May and end at 15:00 on Friday, 17 May.

We will publish details about the schedule and venue later.

## Practical information

For the sessions, we will use the room [SB-L200](https://maps.chalmers.se/#b7834339-e8ef-4c9a-b593-b89854ccfa72), located at [Sven Hultins gata 6](https://maps.app.goo.gl/bVfwLpVusv3LoGKk7).
At the entrance, walk right and take the first staircase to SB-L200.

The [**Chalmers**](https://maps.app.goo.gl/sk3ygGvYDt2wcfEN8) tram and bus stop is located a short distance from the venue.

From the train station, you can walk a short distance to [**Brunnsparken**](https://maps.app.goo.gl/1Zi2gNZNvEWeLzHk9), from which the following two lines can be taken directly to Chalmers.

* Tram 10 (towards Guldheden)
* Bus 16 (towards Högsbohöjd)

You can use the [Västtrafik](https://www.vasttrafik.se/en/) app or [pay with a credit card](https://www.vasttrafik.se/en/Tickets/more-about-tickets/Tap-payment/) for a single ticket.
